products.name: The Complete Coding Interview Guide in Java
products.overview: The Complete Coding Interview Guide in Java is an all-inclusive solution guide with meticulously crafted code examples and proven best practices for tackling the toughest coding interview questions.
products.long_description: The Complete Coding Interview Guide in Java is an all-inclusive solution guide with meticulously crafted code examples and proven best practices for tackling the toughest coding interview questions. This book will help you to verify your Java knowledge and basic coding skills to the interviewer.

products.name: Head First Design Patterns
products.overview: Head First Design Patterns is a great way to look at the tough subject of design patterns.
products.long_description: Head First Design Patterns simulates the way your brain works to make learning more effective using cognitive science and multi-sensory techniques.

products.name: Clean Code
products.overview: Even bad code can function. But if code isn't clean, it can bring a development organization to its knees.
products.long_description: Clean Code by Robert C. Martin presents principles and best practices for writing maintainable, readable, and professional code.

products.name: The Pragmatic Programmer
products.overview: A timeless book that helps developers improve their thinking and coding habits.
products.long_description: Written by Dave Thomas and Andy Hunt, this book offers practical advice on software craftsmanship, career development, and problem solving.

products.name: JavaScript: The Good Parts
products.overview: A deep look into the core features of JavaScript.
products.long_description: This book removes the bad parts of JavaScript and focuses on the reliable, maintainable subset of the language.

products.name: Refactoring
products.overview: Improving the design of existing code without changing its behavior.
products.long_description: Martin Fowler explains how to refactor code step by step to make it cleaner and easier to maintain.

products.name: Effective Java
products.overview: Best practices for writing robust Java code.
products.long_description: Joshua Bloch shares proven techniques for writing efficient, maintainable, and high-quality Java applications.

products.name: Introduction to Algorithms
products.overview: The definitive guide to algorithms.
products.long_description: Commonly known as CLRS, this book covers sorting, searching, graph algorithms, and complexity analysis in depth.

products.name: You Don't Know JS Yet
products.overview: Deep understanding of JavaScript internals.
products.long_description: This book explains scopes, closures, async behavior, and how JavaScript actually works under the hood.

products.name: System Design Interview – An Insider’s Guide
products.overview: Learn how to design scalable systems.
products.long_description: Covers real-world system design problems such as URL shorteners, chat systems, and distributed databases.

products.name: Spring Boot in Action
products.overview: Build production-ready Spring Boot applications.
products.long_description: Hands-on guide to REST APIs, microservices, Spring Security, JPA, and deployment.

products.name: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
products.overview: A deep dive into modern data systems and scalable architectures.
products.long_description: This book explains the architecture of modern data-intensive applications, covering databases, distributed systems, scalability, and reliability with real-world engineering trade-offs.

products.name: Cracking the Coding Interview
products.overview: 189 programming interview questions and solutions.
products.long_description: A must-have interview preparation book covering data structures, algorithms, system design basics, and behavioral interview strategies.

products.name: Grokking Algorithms
products.overview: A friendly illustrated guide to algorithms.
products.long_description: This book explains complex algorithmic concepts using simple language and visuals, making it perfect for beginners.

products.name: Microservices Patterns
products.overview: Best practices for building microservices architectures.
products.long_description: Covers decomposition strategies, inter-service communication, data management, and deployment patterns for microservices.

products.name: Domain-Driven Design
products.overview: Tackling complexity in the heart of software.
products.long_description: Eric Evans introduces domain-driven design concepts that help teams model complex business domains effectively.

products.name: Kubernetes Up & Running
products.overview: Dive into container orchestration with Kubernetes.
products.long_description: Learn how to deploy, manage, and scale containerized applications using Kubernetes in production environments.

products.name: Docker Deep Dive
products.overview: A complete guide to Docker and containerization.
products.long_description: Explains Docker fundamentals, images, containers, networking, and best practices for production use.

products.name: The Mythical Man-Month
products.overview: Essays on software engineering.
products.long_description: A classic book discussing software project management, productivity, and why adding more developers can slow a project.

products.name: Algorithms to Live By
products.overview: Applying computer science concepts to everyday life.
products.long_description: Explores how algorithms can help with decision-making, scheduling, and optimization in daily life.

products.name: Programming Pearls
products.overview: Timeless programming problem-solving techniques.
products.long_description: Focuses on algorithmic thinking, problem decomposition, and elegant coding solutions.

products.name: The Art of Computer Programming (Vol. 1)
products.overview: Foundational concepts of computer algorithms.
products.long_description: Donald Knuth’s legendary work covering fundamental algorithms and mathematical techniques in computer science.

products.name: Learning React
products.overview: Modern React development from fundamentals to hooks.
products.long_description: Covers JSX, hooks, state management, performance optimization, and best practices for React apps.

products.name: Node.js Design Patterns
products.overview: Best practices for building scalable Node.js applications.
products.long_description: Explains proven design patterns, async flows, and architectural techniques for Node.js systems.

products.name: Soft Skills: The Software Developer’s Life Manual
products.overview: Career and life advice for developers.
products.long_description: Covers productivity, communication, career growth, and financial planning for software engineers.

products.name: System Design Made Easy
products.overview: Beginner-friendly guide to system design concepts.
products.long_description: Introduces scalability, load balancing, caching, and databases using simple examples and diagrams.

products.name: Advanced Java Concurrency
products.overview: Master multithreading, concurrency, and performance tuning in Java.
products.long_description: This book dives deep into Java concurrency concepts such as threads, executors, synchronization, locks, concurrent collections, and performance optimization. Ideal for backend engineers preparing for high-scale systems and interviews.
